document.full_text: sales of distressed u.s. homes fell in the first quarter as demand remained weak, but they still made up about 28 percent of total sales, the highest amount in a year, a realtytrac report said on thursday.
document.title: distressed home sales fall in q1: realtytrac
lines_and_colors: sales of distressed u.s. homes fell in the first quarter as demand remained weak, but they still made up about 28 percent of total sales, the highest amount in a year, a realtytrac report said on thursday.
